dao.name: CHK_ROOM_COD_ORDER_IS_EXIST_BY_ROOMCOD
dao.statement: select count(*) as room_count from room_cod_order where athena_id = :athena_id and room_cod = :room_cod and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_COD_ORDER
dao.statement: select rmod.* , rm.room_nam from room_cod_order rmod inner join (select distinct athena_id,hotel_cod,room_cod,room_nam from RVRMCOD_RF) rm on rm.athena_id = rmod.athena_id and rm.hotel_cod = rmod.hotel_cod and rm.room_cod = rmod.room_cod where rmod.athena_id = :athena_id and trim(rmod.hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)
